line_1: Beat on the Deep, and bubble up the Brine.
line_2: Collected Show'rs their falling Forces joyn,

line_1: Then, mutt'ring o'er the deep, buffets th' unruly brine,
line_2: 'Till clouds and water seem to join.

line_1: — Stretch'd on one bier they sleep beneath the brine,
line_2: And their white bones with ivory arms intwine!
